title: Use newly uploaded photo for Founder & Owner section

requirements.text: Add the uploaded image file "B9880E96-BF00-4325-A5A7-C90172ACF09D-16.png" to the frontend as a static asset (served from the frontend, not the backend) under a stable public path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...), and update the Founder & Owner block (frontend/src/components/site/FounderOwnerBlock.tsx) to display this new photo for the founder/owner.

quotes: Add this photo as a owner and founder

acceptanceCriteria: The file "B9880E96-BF00-4325-A5A7-C90172ACF09D-16.png" exists in the frontend public static assets directory and is accessible via a /assets/... URL at runtime.
frontend/src/components/site/FounderOwnerBlock.tsx uses the new /assets/... path for the so the uploaded photo is visible in the Founder & Owner block on both mobile and desktop breakpoints.
The image alt text remains accessible and in English, and continues to reference the Founder/Owner (e.g., "Photo of the Founder and Owner, Nizamuddin Khan").
No backend changes are introduced for serving or fetching the image.

constraints: Keep all user-facing text in English.
Serve the founder/owner photo from frontend static assets (do not serve images via the backend).
Do not introduce blue/purple as the primary palette; preserve the existing construction-themed styling.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the Founder & Owner text content (name, headings, biography) beyond what is necessary to display the new image.
Adding any backend storage, upload flow, or database for images.
